name: Twitter Data Analytics
tagline: Python scripts to analyze twitter data - both real-time and stored.
body:
#Twitter Data Analytics This project is divided into three parts : #### Real time sentiment analysis web application using python and flask. In this part, we create a web application, which determines the sentiment of a user-defined entity, by analyzing the twitter stream.
#### Twitter Data Analysis in python using pandas, nltk and sklearn packages. This part is simply a small script which is like a tutorial to analyze the twitter data by applying various techniques
#### Twitter Data Mining using the twitter API. In this part, we explore the twitter API and use it to collect data into different formats (csv, mongodb etc).
I am in the process of creating a series of Ipython notebooks for this project. Check them out here
